HT_Text_Mum_Eyei_UrukiteGoodbye01.message: لا يمكننا التقدم أكثر، هذا خطر.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Eye_SetMummy_Encounter01.message: أنت! أنت من كان يزعجني مؤخرا!<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Eye_SetMummy_Encounter02.message: You have the audacity to stop the ray! I may be dumbstruck as to how you've done it, but I know how it will end...<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Eye_SetMummy_Encounter03.message: لن يشكل مشكلة بعد الآن. اطلق الشعاع مجددا!<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Eye_SetMummy_Encounter04.message: أستطيع إطلاق الشعاع مجددا يا سيدي، لكن... كلا! لن يحدث هذا!<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Eye_SetMummy_Encounter05.message: اختفى الشعاع! ستضعف قوة الشعاع عن قبل!<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Eye_SetMummy_Encounter06.message: لا يهم. ستوفر حماية كافية إلى أن أجد حلا.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Sewr_Sarcophagus_Presentatio.message: أنا ملك شعب الساركوفاجي. نادوني رمسيس.<E>
If you can light all of these torches around me, I will give you an ancient artifact. <E>
Be careful though, it's just as easy to extinguish them as it is to light them.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Sewr_Sarcophagus_Complete02.message: أين يكن، سأفي بوعدي وأعطيك مكافأتك. و أتمنى أن تكون ذات فائدة!<W 90>

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro1a.message: Arghhhhhhhh!!!!!! I don't believe it! Defeated by a juvenile that I don't even know! The magical device has returned us to the dark castle!<E>

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro1b.message: And now this. We can't use his life energy to take his shape. Now he is worthless to us. I'll have my assistants throw him into the jail to rot with the other corpses.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro2b.message: Yes, sadly the ceremony was interrupted before we got all the <FC 0,128,0>Canopic Vases<END FC> from him. We can't use his life energy to duplicate him.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro1c.message:
The loss of the warping amulets thanks to our unwanted trip also causes me concern. This is a bitter blow...

Without those amulets it will take longer than anticipated to reach our objectives.

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro2c.message: A setback this is, perhaps, but defeat? Pah! Everything is going according to plan. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro1c1.message: Master, how can you say that? <E>

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro2c1.message:
Now that Tutankhamen has been eliminated, I will use the Akhenaten shape and explain to all that Tut has died in an accident.

That will give me power in Luxor. The rest will be easy.

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro1d.message: نعم! هذا صحيح! لن يجرؤ أين منهم أن يقول أنك لست أخوه!<E>

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro2e.message:
And about that youngster interrupting the ceremony... I know who he is. He is a student of Imhotep, that foolish geriatric magician.

This apparent defeat will be useful to confuse his feeble mind further. He will never know what is really going on. He doesn't even realize I was there!

HT_Text_Mum_PreChapter_Palace_Intro2f.message: We need to be careful for now, but when the ray is powerful enough nothing will stop us. Defeating Imhotep will be as easy as crushing an insect. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_ShrinePromptTakeItem.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N>Take the object from the shrine?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_GotPlanetariumKey0.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got the <FC 0,128,0>Solar Planetarium Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got the <FC 0,128,0>Earth Planetarium Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

You got the Earth Planetarium Key!

This object looks very similar to the onein the shrine in the central hall...
<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got the <FC 0,128,0>Lunar Planetarium Key<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

You got the Lunar Planetarium Key!

This object looks very similar to the onein the shrine in the central hall.

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_ElectricDevice.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>This looks like some kind of electrical device.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_Furnace.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR> أشم رائحة غاز قوية.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_ImpulseKey.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>تحتاج <FC 0,128,0>مفتاحا<END FC> لفتح<N> هذا الباب.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_SarcophagusHide.message: Don't worry, my friend. You are just as dead as me. The electricity can't harm you. In fact, you should try to use it to your advantage.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_SarcophagusHide1.message: However, if you want to avoid the electricity in the future, I can help. Just press <SB HT_Action_Enter> when you are close to me.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_ElectricExpired.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><DHP><DP><N><CNTR>Mummy abilities don't last forever. The bar at the<N>top of the screen shows when the ability will expire.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><W 60>

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_ElectricLost.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><DHP><DP><N><CNTR>Electricity will be lost on contact with water.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><W 60>

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_Pushable.message:
Cylindrical objects like these can be pushed and pulled in any direction.

Press when close to the object...

...then use to push or pull.

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_WallSneak.message:
Some narrow ledges can be sneaked across.

Approach the wall and press when it appears.

Once against the wall use to move left and right.

Press again when you wish to come out of wall sneak mode.

HT_Text_Mum_Imp2_Help_LowFence.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>There must be another lever<N>nearby which opens this gate.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Towr_Help_DoorLockedForever.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>الباب مغلق من الجهة الأخرى <N> ولا يمكن فتحه.<ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Mum_Towr_Help_Pushable.message:
Objects like this can be pushed and pulled backwards and forwards.

Press when close to the object...

...then use to push or pull.

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap1_Basket_Presentati.message: You can't even talk! I'm really sorry, but I only had one <FC 0,128,0>Canopic Vase<END FC> for you. <E>

Allow me to introduce myself. I am Bas-Ket. I will tell you what I can, but we haven't much time. I doubt you remember the last thing that happened to you.

The treason on your birthday; the bizarre, unsettling ceremony performed on you by your brother.
قاطع البطل أبو الهول المراسيم. لكنه استرجع مزهرية واحدة فقط.<E>
This bestows upon you the element of life, but you're still pretty much dead. We'll need the rest of the <FC 0,128,0>Canopic Vases<END FC> to return you to your original form. <E>

أنت الآن في قصر الوركاء. لا يكفي الوقت للدخول في التفاصيل لكن صدقني...

الفرصة الوحيدة لمساعدتنا في أعماق هذا المكان المهجور. علينا معرفة أهمية هذه القلعة المشؤومة ومن المسؤول عن هذا كله.

عليك أيضا البحث عن معلومات أو أدوات قد تساعدنا لنرجعك إنسانا.

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap1_Menes_Assistants1.message: Be sure that all the traps are working. I want no doubt in my mind that the castle is impenetrable. The Abydosian jewels must be protected! <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap1_Menes_Assistants2.message: If so much as a rat tries to enter the castle, pulverize it! <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap3_Menes_Set_Chimney.message: سيدي! تسلل أحدهم للقلعة! اختفت بعض من <FC 0,128,0>جواهر الأبيدوس<END FC>!<E>
ماذا؟! هذا مستحيل! متأكد من أن الشعاع يحمي القلعة.<E>
It should be, but odds be confounded! Someone has found a way into the castle! <E>

Bah, it's probably one of the Urukites, the old inhabitants of Uruk. Nothing to cause concern.

We have eliminated nearly everyone, but we must stop them wandering the castle.
Yes, Master. I have already taken the necessary precautions. The Urukite is probably using the old network of secret corridors in the castle. <E>
I have introduced a new type of trap. We tested it on some prisoners with very effective results. Allow me to demonstrate with this guardian.<E>
Hahaha... wonderful! Menes, what a truly gracious manner in which to greet our guests. I expected nothing less from you. Hahaha! <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap4_Menes_CadaverRoom.message: هممم... لا شيء هنا. أوه، عدا مئات الجثث الملقية...<E>
I want all corners of the castle inspected carefully. Set is infuriated because we've yet to find the intruder. We'll hunt around the clock if necessary! <E>
نحن نضيع الوقت هنا. هيا، سنذهب للجناح الشمالي.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap5_Urukite_Presentat.message: آرغغ!!! وحش!!! ظننت أني سأموت جوعا لكن هذا أسوء بكثير. آغغ!!<E>
Back I say, you monstrosity!!! Set can kill me, but do not steal my soul!<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap5_Urukite_OpenCage1.message: ما هذا؟ أنت هنا لتحريري؟ من تكون؟<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap5_Urukite_OpenCage2.message: Hmm... you don't look as frightening outside the cage... Why are you helping me?<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap5_Urukite_OpenCage3.message: حبسوني بتهمة سرقة مجوهرات من القصر، لكني بريء!<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap5_Urukite_OpenCage4.message: My name is Khensu. I'm an Urukite. We were the inhabitants of this region before Set appeared. Now, only a few of us remain, surviving in this castle.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap5_Urukite_OpenCage5.message: We've avoided Set and his minions until now because we know the region. But as their numbers swell, our time will soon be up. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap5_Urukite_OpenCage6.message: Unless someone helps us, eventually, he'll find us all...<E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap5_Urukite_OpenCage7.message: Anyway, we mustn't remain in this room. Set's guards are wily, and could appear here at any moment. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_Pala_Chap5_Urukite_OpenCage8.message: تعال معي! سأساعدك على الهرب من هته الزنزانة.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap2_Start_Basket01.message: Good to see you again my friend! As promised, I've delivered the second <FC 0,128,0>Canopic Vase<END FC> and you look healthier than ever!<E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap2_Start_Basket02.message: أرسل أبو الهول شيئا آخر قد يثير اهتمامك...<E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap2_Start_Basket03.message: ...the <FC 0,128,0>Dark Stone of Invisibility<END FC>. It's a magic artifact that turns you invisible whenever you activate it! <E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap2_Start_Basket04.message: However, it has one serious limitation. It can only be used when you are standing still. Start walking, and you'll be visible to all once more.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap2_Start_Basket05.message:
With this new artifact you should be able to explore and research more of this evil place. We need to find out what is going on here as soon as possible.

Good luck!

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap2_MenesSet_Invisibi.message: سيدي، عاد جاسوسنا من <FC 128,64,0>هيليوبوليس<END FC> حاملا أخبارا عن أبو الهول.<E>
ممتاز! حورس، حليفنا الجديد، أي خبر تحمل لي؟<E>
Master, I'm very sorry, but I must inform you that Sphinx has made contact with Anubis.<E>
What? I didn't expect him to get so far. I wonder what that old fox Anubis wants from him...<E>
Well, no matter; he will be able to do very little. I have locked the access to <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis Point<END FC> with the magical seal of Atun. <E>
Wonderful! That seal is indestructible. Even my power would not be enough!<E>
Only the <FC 0,128,0>Atun Statue<END FC> used to create the seal can break it, and that is stored upstairs under heavy protection.<E>
The seal is an unnecessary precaution. I decided a good-natured approach would be wise, so I gave him a small present: the <FC 0,128,0>Dark Stone of Invisibility<END FC>. <E>
When he uses it he will suffer the most hideous of deaths.<E>
هاهاهاها! أحمق هو من يستعمل هذا الحجر!<E>
Horus, I will reward you for your cunning. An excellent deceit that will benefit us without any doubt.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap3_Basket1.message:
Hello again, my friend! Ahh that Canopic Vase has really put some color in your cheeks!

Don't waste any more time, get exploring the castle and find out as much as you can!

Farewell and good luck!

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap4_Basket1.message:
Long time, no see my friend! Yet another Canopic Vase safely delivered. I'm sure we'll have you back to your old self in no time!

Until then, we still need you to gather as many artifacts and bits of information as you can.

You are doing great so far, keep up the good work! See you soon!

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap6_Urukites_Start01.message: Hello, I am Sobek, the chief of the Urukites. Khensu told us you freed him. An audacious feat. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap6_Urukites_Start02.message: We've long wondered who the hero was, who continuously defied Set and stole his treasures from under his nose, in his own castle. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap6_Urukites_Start03.message: You are a real hero for my people, and the only person that could conceive of challenging Set. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap6_Urukites_Start04.message: Khensu has also told us that a magical character was giving you energy with a <FC 0,128,0>Canopic Vase<END FC>. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap6_Urukites_Start05.message: We found this one lost in one of the rooms of the castle. Until now we didn't understand its purpose.<E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap6_Urukites_Start06.message: Please, help us. Our kind are as old as the land of <FC 128,64,0>Uruk<END FC> itself. Now Set is here we are nothing but prey, hunted by those savage beasts. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap6_Urukites_Start07.message: We know where Set draws his strength from. He uses an overwhelming magical device to generate the ray, his main power. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap6_Urukites_Start08.message: Sadly, this task is beyond the Urukites, but if you can deactivate it, Set will lose his main strength; his crucial advantage. <E>

HT_Text_Mum_pala_Chap6_Urukites_Start09.message: Follow us and we will show you the place... <W 90>
